item.title: Building Reusable GitHub Actions in TypeScript, using the official toolkit
item.description: GitHub Actions now supports CI/CD - and while the workers for Actions come pre-configured with support for lots of programming languages and frameworks, you have the option to use an existing action to configure the environment, or build your own. In this article we will see how to build reusable actions using the Actions toolkit
